org.spongepowered.api.command.args

Class CommandContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.command.args.CommandContext

  • public final class CommandContext
extends Object
    Context that a command is executed in. This object stores parsed arguments from other commands

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommandContext.Snapshot
      A snapshot of a CommandContext.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String TAB_COMPLETION
      The argument key to indicate that a tab completion is taking place.
      static String TARGET_BLOCK_ARG
      The argument key for a target block position that may be present during tab completion, of type Location<World>.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandContext()
      Create a new empty CommandContext.

      • getOne

        public <T> Optional<T> getOne(String key)
        Gets the value for the given key if the key has only one value.

        An empty Optional indicates that there are either zero or more than one values for the given key. Use hasAny(Text) to verify which.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the expected type of the argument
        Parameters:
        key - the key to get
        Returns:
        the argument

      • getOne

      • requireOne

        public <T> T requireOne(String key)
                 throws NoSuchElementException,
                        IllegalArgumentException,
                        ClassCastException
        Gets the value for the given key if the key has only one value, throws an exception otherwise.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the expected type of the argument
        Parameters:
        key - the key to get
        Returns:
        the argument
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if there is no element with the associated key
        IllegalArgumentException - if there are more than one element associated with the key (thus, the argument is illegal in this context)
        ClassCastException - if the element type is not what is expected by the caller

      • createSnapshot

        public CommandContext.Snapshot createSnapshot()
        Gets a snapshot of the data inside this context to allow it to be restored later.

        This is only guaranteed to create a shallow copy of the backing store. If any value is mutable, any changes to that value will be reflected in this snapshot. It is therefore not recommended that you keep this snapshot around for longer than is necessary.

        Returns:
        The CommandContext.Snapshot containing the current state of the CommandContext

      • applySnapshot

        public void applySnapshot(CommandContext.Snapshot snapshot)
        Resets a CommandContext to a previous state using a previously created CommandContext.Snapshot.
        Parameters:
        snapshot - The CommandContext.Snapshot to restore this context with
